clean_text: Delivery was delayed again and customer support ignored my emails
My package arrived late and nobody explained why
Support agent was friendly and solved my problem quickly
I am happy with how fast support responded
The price is too high for the quality offered
I feel disappointed because prices increased again
The app interface looks modern and easy to use
Food quality has improved significantly over the last month
I love the new menu options available
AI features are impressive and very useful
The intelligence of the system keeps getting better
Overall, I'm satisfied with my experience
I'm content with the service provided
